message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for you.  Given its potential, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,150,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,050,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the value of this product to you is significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,125,000.
Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product to me, I would like to counter with an offer of $1,100,000.
